info.author: Giovanni Cardamone (MrStep)
info.description:
pypack.singleton 0.1.0
======================

.. epigraph::
    
    **pypack.singlethon** is python package for *python3* that provides
    Singleton design patter for python class, easy to use and fast to
    implement.

    Source code: `Github <https://github.com/pypack/singleton>`_

Installing:
-----------
.. code-block:: sh

    pip install pypack.singleton

Import in python module:
------------------------
.. code-block:: python

    from pypack.singleton import Singleton

Make a class singleton:
-----------------------
.. code-block:: python

    @Singleton
    class Foo: pass


Example:
--------
.. code-block:: python

    from pypack.singleton import Singleton

    @Singleton
    class Foo:
        def __init__ (self, arg):
            print(arg)

    a = Foo ('Hello, world!')
    b = Foo ()
    c = Foo ()

    a == b
    b == c

    # Output:
    # Hello, world!
    # True
    # True
info.name: pypack.singleton
